faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Answers to common questions about ASMS full-service warehouse.

items.q: What’s the difference between service and self-storage?
items.a: ASMS manages and operates the entire service warehouse for you — ideal for customers who don’t need regular access. Self-storage lets customers access and organize their units 24/7.

items.q: How can I retrieve my items?
items.a: Simply contact ASMS via phone, email, or app, and our team will deliver them to your address.

items.q: How many warehouses does ASMS have?
items.a: We currently operate three main locations: An Phu, Thu Duc, and Dong Nai.

items.q: Are there restrictions on stored items?
items.a: You can store most goods except hazardous materials, perishables, or items with strong odors.
